00435        * Happens in a separate thread.

00441          goto out;

00446          case IO_READ:
00447             /* Initialise read pointers */
00448             if(UninitialiseReadCapture(&Capture))
00449             {
00450                CapError("Failed to initialise read buffer.\n");
00451                ret = -CAPERROR_UNINITCAPTURE;
00452                goto out;
00453             }
00454             break;
00455          case IO_MMAP:
00456             if(UninitialiseMmapCapture(&Capture))
00457             {
00458                CapError("Failed to uninitialise mmap buffers.\n");
00459                ret = -CAPERROR_UNINITCAPTURE;

00461             }
00462             break;

00464             if(UninitialiseUserptrCapture(&Capture))
00465             {
00466                CapError("Failed to uninitialise userptr buffers.\n");
00467                ret = -CAPERROR_UNINITCAPTURE;
00468                goto out;
00469             }
00470             break;
00471          default:
00472             CapError("Invalid IO method: %d\n", Capture.ioType);
00473             ret = -CAPERROR_UNINITCAPTURE;
00474             goto out;
00475       }
00476       CloseCaptureDevice(Capture.fd, &Capture);
00477    }
00478 
00479 out:
00480    if(ret < 0)
00481       CloseCaptureDevice(Capture.fd, &Capture);
00482 
00483    CloseCaptureDeviceControl(Capture.ctrlFd);
00484 
00485    return CAPERROR_NOERROR;
00486 }

int SetupValues ( sCmdLineArgs  CmdLineArgs,
psCapture  pCapture 
) 

00203 {
00204    int got_width = 0;
00205 
00206    if (CmdLineArgs.capture_count == 0)
00207       pCapture->capture_count = -1; /* -1 is continuous capture */
00208    else
00209    {
00210       pCapture->capture_count = CmdLineArgs.capture_count;
00211    }
00212    
00213    if(CmdLineArgs.output_width[0] == 0)
00214       pCapture->output_width = 640;
00215    else
00216    {
00217       pCapture->output_width = strtol(CmdLineArgs.output_width, 0, 10);
00218       if(pCapture->output_width < 0 ||
00219          pCapture->output_width > 4096)
00220          return -1;
00221       got_width = 1;
00222    }
00223 
00224    if(CmdLineArgs.output_height[0] == 0)
00225    {
00226       /* If we got a width, use a 4:3 aspect to get the default height */
00227       if(got_width)
00228       {
00229          pCapture->output_height = (pCapture->output_width * 3) / 4;
00230       }
00231       else
00232          pCapture->output_height = 480;
00233    }
00234    else
00235    {
00236       pCapture->output_height = strtol(CmdLineArgs.output_height, 0, 10);
00237       if(pCapture->output_height < 0 ||
00238          pCapture->output_height > 4096)
00239          return -1;
00240    }
00241 
00242    if(CmdLineArgs.output_pixfmt[0] == 0)
00243       pCapture->output_pixfmt = V4L2_PIX_FMT_RGB565;
00244    else
00245    {
00246       if((pCapture->output_pixfmt = IsSupportedPixelFormat(CmdLineArgs.output_pixfmt)) == 0)
00247       {
00248          CapError("Invalid pixel format: %s\n", CmdLineArgs.output_pixfmt);
00249          return -1;
00250       }
00251    }
00252 
00253    if(CmdLineArgs.output_io[0] == 0)
00254       pCapture->ioType = IO_READ;
00255    else
00256    {
00257       if(!strcmp(CmdLineArgs.output_io, "read"))
00258          pCapture->ioType = IO_READ;
00259       else if(!strcmp(CmdLineArgs.output_io, "mmap"))
00260          pCapture->ioType = IO_MMAP;
00261       else if(!strcmp(CmdLineArgs.output_io, "userptr"))
00262          pCapture->ioType = IO_USERPTR;
00263       else
00264       {
00265          CapError("Invalid IO method: %s\n", CmdLineArgs.output_io);
00266          return -1;
00267       }
00268    }
00269 
00270    if(CmdLineArgs.frame_rate[0] == 0)
00271    {
00272       pCapture->fFrameRate = 0.0;
00273    }
00274    else
00275    {
00276       char* endPtr = 0;
00277       pCapture->fFrameRate = strtof(CmdLineArgs.frame_rate, &endPtr);
00278       if((pCapture->fFrameRate == 0.0 && errno != 0) ||
00279           endPtr == CmdLineArgs.frame_rate ||
00280           endPtr != &CmdLineArgs.frame_rate[strlen(CmdLineArgs.frame_rate)])
00281       {
00282          CapError("Invalid frame rate: %s\n", CmdLineArgs.frame_rate);
00283          pCapture->fFrameRate = 0.0;
00284          return -1;
00285       }
00286       else if(pCapture->fFrameRate <= 0.0 ||
00287          pCapture->fFrameRate > 1000.0)
00288       {
00289          CapError("Invalid frame rate: %.2f\n", pCapture->fFrameRate);
00290          pCapture->fFrameRate = 0.0;
00291          return -1;
00292       }
00293    }
00294 
00295    if(CmdLineArgs.composing[0] != 0)
00296    {
00297       /* Tokenise the composing string */
00298       if(TokenizeComposing(pCapture, CmdLineArgs.composing, strlen(CmdLineArgs.composing)))
00299          return -1;
00300    }
00301 
00302    if(CmdLineArgs.cropping[0] != 0)
00303    {
00304       /* Tokenise the cropping string */
00305       if(TokenizeCropping(pCapture, CmdLineArgs.cropping, strlen(CmdLineArgs.cropping)))
00306          return -1;
00307    }
00308 
00309    if(CmdLineArgs.delay[0] == 0)
00310       pCapture->delay = 0;
00311    else
00312    {
00313       pCapture->delay = strtol(CmdLineArgs.delay, 0, 10);
00314       if(pCapture->delay < 0) /* Less than0ms doesn't make sense */
00315          pCapture->delay = 0;
00316       else if(pCapture->delay > 10000) /* Capped at 10s */
00317          pCapture->delay = 10000;
00318    }
00319 
00320    pCapture->timestamp = CmdLineArgs.timestamp;
00321    pCapture->livestream = CmdLineArgs.livestream;
00322    pCapture->ganging_type = CmdLineArgs.ganging_type;
00323 
00324    return 0;
00325 }

int TokenizeComposing ( psCapture  pCapture,
char *  pComposingBuffer,
unsigned long  length 
) 

00081 {
00082    unsigned char value[MAX_LEN];
00083    int values = LEFT;
00084    int i, pos;
00085 
00086    BOOL bEnd = 0;
00087 
00088    pCapture->ComposingActive = 0;
00089 
00090    pos = 0;
00091    while(!bEnd)
00092    {
00093       /* Get a value */
00094       for(i=0; pos<=length; i++,pos++)
00095       {
00096          if(pComposingBuffer[pos] == 0)
00097          {
00098             bEnd = 1;
00099             i++;
00100             break;
00101          }
00102          else if(pComposingBuffer[pos] != ',')
00103             value[i] = pComposingBuffer[pos];
00104          else if(pComposingBuffer[pos] == ',')
00105          {
00106             break;
00107          }
00108       }
00109       value[i] = 0;
00110 
00111       switch(values)
00112       {
00113          case TOP:
00114             pCapture->ComposeTop = atoi(value);
00115             values++;
00116             break;
00117          case LEFT:
00118             pCapture->ComposeLeft = atoi(value);
00119             values++;
00120             break;
00121          case WIDTH:
00122             pCapture->ComposeWidth = atoi(value);
00123             values++;
00124             break;
00125          case HEIGHT:
00126             pCapture->ComposeHeight = atoi(value);
00127             values++;
00128             break;
00129       }
00130       pos++;
00131    }
00132 
00133    if(values > HEIGHT)
00134       pCapture->ComposingActive = 1;
00135    else
00136       return -1;
00137 
00138    return 0;
00139 }

void usage ( int  argc,
char *  argv[] 
) 

00041 {
00042    fprintf(stdout, "\nUsage: %s [OPTIONS]\n", argv[0]);
00043    fprintf(stdout, "Perform a capture from a video4linux capture device.\n\n");
00044    fprintf(stdout, "  -d: Specify video4linux device                                              (default: /dev/video0)\n");
00045    fprintf(stdout, "  -w: Specify output buffer width                                             (default: 640)\n");
00046    fprintf(stdout, "  -h: Specify output buffer height                                            (default: 480)\n");
00047    fprintf(stdout, "  -p: Specify output buffer pixel format                                      (default: RGB565)\n");
00048    fprintf(stdout, "  -i: Specify video4linux capture IO type, \"read/mmap/userptr\"                (default: \"read\")\n");
00049    fprintf(stdout, "  -r: Specify frame rate (in Hz, max 2 dp.)                                   (default: input source rate)\n");
00050    fprintf(stdout, "  -C: Specify image composition in output buffer (format: x,y,width,height)   (default: use entire buffer)\n");
00051    fprintf(stdout, "  -c: Specify cropping (format: x,y,width,height)                             (default: no cropping applied)\n");
00052    fprintf(stdout, "  -n: Use non-blocking IO                                                     (not supported by Vision / VisionLC driver yet)\n");
00053    fprintf(stdout, "  -t: Print timestamp information                                             (default: off)\n");
00054    fprintf(stdout, "  -l: Use liveStream                                                          (default: off)\n");
00055    fprintf(stdout, "  -g: Specify input ganging type\n");
00056    fprintf(stdout, "       0: \"off\", 1: \"2x2\", 2: \"4x1\", 3: \"1x4\",\n");
00057    fprintf(stdout, "       4: \"2x1\", 5: \"1x2\", 6: \"3x1\", 7: \"1x3\"                                 (default: off)\n");             
00058    fprintf(stdout, "  -z: Add delay in ms between dequeuing frames                                (default: off, no added delay)\n");
00059    fprintf(stdout, "  -j: Specify number of buffers to capture                                    (default: continuous capture)\n");
00060 }
